Question
========
A teacher wonders whether the mean grade for methods theory (variable: methods theory) for students living away from home [Residential = 0] differs from the mean for students living at home [Residential = 1]. Perform the analysis and provide the t-value (to 3 decimal places).

* Download**: [SPSS file](eur-inferential_statistics-259-nl-data.sav), [CSV file](eur-inferential_statistics-259-nl-data.csv)


Solution
========
The correct answer is -2,070.
